metadata.Title: CVE-2017-4965 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in these Pivotal RabbitMQ versions: all 3.4.xversions, all 3.5.x versions, and 3.6.x versions prior to 3.6.9; and theseRabbitMQ for PCF versions: all 1.5.x versions, 1.6.x versions prior to1.6.18, and 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.15. Several forms in the RabbitMQmanagement UI are vulnerable to XSS attacks.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
